thread.title: ITG Expected to Name JPMorgan Managing Director as CEO
thread.title_full: ITG Expected to Name JPMorgan Managing Director as CEO - WSJ

author: Sarah Krouse
title: ITG Expected to Name JPMorgan Managing Director as CEO
text:
Brokerage firm Investment Technology Group Inc. is expected to name J.P. Morgan Chase & Co. managing director Frank Troise as its next chief executive, according to people familiar with the matter.
The appointment follows the August ouster of ITG’s previous CEO, Robert Gasser, and a $20.3 million settlement with the Securities and Exchange Commission relating to the firm’s “dark pool” pilot program. Mr. Gasser had led the firm...
